DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Estimate Dry Mouth OAB Patients With Solifenacin
DOC.detailed_description: To estimate dry mouth impact efficacy drug overactive bladder patient solifenacin
DOC.criteria: 1 ) male female patient 20 year age old 2 ) clinical history OAB least 3 month prior visit 2 3 ) 3 total score 2 Q 3 index OABSS questionnaire 1 ) In clinical trial , female pregnant , intent become pregnant breastfeed 2 ) postvoided residual urine volume > 150ml 3 ) history catheterization due acute urinary retention 4 ) history pelvic surgery within 6 month 5 ) 6 ) 7 ) history neurovascular disease Parkinson 's disease , cerebral vascular disease , spinal injury multiple sclerosis 8 ) patient indwell catheter intermittent catheterization 9 ) active recurrent ( > 3 episode per year ) urinary tract infection 10 ) use follow medication least 2 week anticholinergic Tricyclic antidepressant , antiepilepsy drug , antiParkinson 's disease drug , antiarrythmia drug type I Chlorpromazine , Thioridazine , Piperazine MAO inhibitor 11 ) Patient currently take take within past 4 week alphablocker treatment benign prostatic hypertrophy 12 ) Patient currently take take within past 8 week 5ARI estrogen medication 13 ) Patient currently use use medication know activity inhibitor inducer cytochrome P4503A4 ( CYP3A4 )
